content: to the moon and back 1 is a beautiful scarf adorned with lovely puff stitches it is crocheted from a single skein of twister which is available in a plethora of ​​beautiful colorways **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 3 5 mm **yarn ** twister galaxy glaze #04 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** **st** - stitch **chain** - chain **single_crochet** - single_crochet **half_double_crochet** - half_double_crochet **double_crochet** - double_crochet **slip_stitch** - slip_stitch **t-chain** - turning chain **puff** - is made over the previously made half_double_crochet yarn over insert hook around the half_double_crochet and yarn over repeat 4 times in total yarn over and pull the yarn through all 8 loops on the hook yarn over and pull the yarn through the last 2 sts on the hook 1 https //hobbii com/to-the-moon-and-back-scarf utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=to-the-moon-and-back-scarf+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
